name: Verminses Beta
description:
Small game based around "/v/ermin", bootleg pokemon-style monster designs produced anonymously by browsers of 4chan's /v/ board. All monster designs belong to the original creator, all art used in game is drawn by me with the paintbrush and paintbucket in microsoft paint.

This game is a demo i made and release back in 2018, and in 2019 i have started work on a new /v/ermin game improving upon this one.
